definition: policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: The masterminds of the prospiracy to help the refugees escape were themselves former refugees.
sentences.chinese: 难民逃脱计划的策划人自己本身之前就是难民。

sentences.english: I’m the broadcast recording engineer for Tell Me More.
sentences.chinese: 我是《告诉我更多》的广播录音策划人。

sentences.english: Are you a natural mathematician , writer, or party planner?
sentences.chinese: 你是否天生是个数学家，作家或者宴会策划人？

sentences.english: One of main directors of HUST digital library project
sentences.chinese: HUST数字图书馆计划的主要策划人之一。

sentences.english: Military planners have also expressed concern that attempts would be made to kidnap him.
sentences.chinese: 军事策划人员同一时间也表示出了对绑架的忧虑。

sentences.english: Now, she is trying to reinvent herself as an events planner.
sentences.chinese: 现在她正努力朝活动策划人的方向发展。

sentences.english: Actually, network game to producer, engineer the requirement of personnel especially, it is very tall.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，网络游戏对于制作人，尤其是策划人员。

definition: to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
trader or dealer (of stocks and shares etc)
